Lists.desc: Fixed Upon reentry to Dashboard > Application Dashboard, fixed the issue where the data is not displayed.

Fixed In the Hitmap widget of the Dashboard > Application Dashboard menu, fixed the issue where the time selector and the x-axis of the chart are not set to the time value of the retrieved data when the Analysis > Hitmap menu appears.
Fixed Fixed the issue where the common modal is located at the top of the page.
Fixed In Dashboard > IIS Perf. Count, fixed the issue where the time selector appears when checking a chart in full screen by clicking the button of the widget.
Feature Replaced components of the time selector in each individual menu.
Feature In Flex Board or Integrated Flex Board, added the following features in the Alert list widget.
Lists.details:
• Added the View resolved events option.

  • Added the option to select a query time independent of the time set on the dashboard.

Lists.desc: Feature Added the following features in Analysis > Metrics Chart New.
Lists.details:
• Different UI display depending on whether the widget legend is to be shown on the dashboard

    On: Widget with a fixed legend panel

    Off: Widget with a legend panel provided as a drop-down

  • Legend filtering of widgets

  • Highlighting the chart line when hovering over the legend of the widget

  • When there are many chart lines, provided the feature so that the graph color does not become blurred.

Lists.desc: Feature In Alert > Event Configuration New, added the description to the Resolved notification option.
Feature In Alert > Notifications, added the Smart message (AI) option to send notification messages with user-friendly content via AI.
Changed In the Flex Board menu of the project, removed Project name among the dashboard list sorting options.
Changed In the event addition or modification screen of the Alert > Event Configuration menu, modified to test by applying the event reception tag selection items when the Test alert feature is run.
Changed In the event addition or modification screen of the Alert > Event Configuration > Metrics tab, modified to apply ${ } to all fields when Selector is selected for the Event rule option.
Fixed In Account Management, fixed the issue where the Notification language setting is displayed as "ja."
Fixed Fixed the missing or misspelled title at the top of the screen in some menus.
Feature In the Table view tab of the Trace analysis window, added the bind variable copying feature when checking the SQL information details.
Feature In Statistics > Transaction, added the Trend comparison feature that allows you to see the information details by selecting multiple transactions.
Feature In Alert > Event Configuration New, added the Agent duplication alert option for the application.
Changed Added the download and related texts for agent installation files for .NET platforms using the versions less than .NET 4.6.1 or Windows 2008.

Fixed In the Today's visits widget of the Dashboard > Application Dashboard menu, fixed the issue where the today's maximum value does not appear when the presious day's maximum value is greater than that of today's.
Feature In Server List > Server Inventory, added the feature that replaces the custom columns in the server list by uploading a CSV file.
Changed In Dashboard > Server Inventory Map, changed the initialization method for the grouping option selection tools.
Lists.details: Changed from clicking the Clear button to selecting Not set. from the list.

Lists.desc: Changed Changed the Filter option UI of the Server List > Server Inventory menu to be the same as the Filter option of the Server Inventory Map menu.
Changed In Management > Agent Installation > HP-UX, added the agent download button for IA64 Kernel 11.31.
Fixed In the group summary panel of the Dashboard > Server Inventory Map menu, fixed the issue where the Server uptime chart is intermittently clicked.
Fixed In Dashboard > Server Inventory Map, fixed the bug where a previous time can be selected after replacing the time selector components.
Fixed In Server List > Server List, fixed the bug where the time appears as NaN and a previous time can be selected when the real-time mode of the time selector is paused.
Fixed In Column settings of the Server List > Server List menu, fixed the issue where all the selected columns are released when the Initialized button is clicked.
Fixed In Server List > Server Detail, fixed the issue where the corresponding page does not appear when the agent viewed through the agent/IP search feature of the side menu is selected.
Feature In the detailed information of the Cluster > Ingress List menu, added the application information.
Feature In Cluster > etcd Dashboard, added the guide message modal.
Feature If the version of the installed agent is less than the supported version when the Cluster > etcd Dashboard menu is entered, the display feature of the update guide screen has been added.
Feature Added the link to the resource list in the Detail window in the following menu paths:
Lists.details:
• Cluster > Node Timeline

  • Cluster > Ingress List

Lists.desc: Feature In the Node configuration tab for the detailed information provided by the following menu path, added the total values for CPU, memory, and disk.
Lists.details:
• Dashboard > Node Map
  • Cluster > Node List
  • Cluster > Node Timeline

Lists.desc: Changed In the Management > Project Management menu for the namespace project, modified not to change the projeet name.
Feature Provided the pagination feature in the Active sessions table.
Lists.details:
• Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance
  • Dashboard > Monitoring Multiple Instances

Lists.desc: Feature Added the feature to check the result from the User Behavior menu when a user updated the agent in Management > Agent Update.
Feature Added the feature to check the result from the User Behavior menu when a user executed SQLs in Laboratory > Script Manager.
Changed Changed the support period for the database V1 from December 31, 2024 to June 26, 2025.
Changed In Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance, fixed the issue where the chart appears blank when changing the real-time query range.
Fixed Fixed the issue where the Active sessions table in the following menu path displays the data that exceeds the 1-minute range.
Lists.details:
• Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance
  • Analysis > Counts Trend Comparison

Lists.desc: Feature In Dashboard > Monitoring Multiple Instances, added the feature to display the unit for the metric selected in the custom widget.
Feature In the Correlated DB information window, added the button that pastes the bind variable value copied from the Trace analysis window for the APM project.
Changed In Analysis > Counts Trend Comparison, changed the title of the Active sessions table.
Changed When moving to Monitoring a Database Instance from the Correlated DB information window, changed to include the start time, end time, and session period as query parameters.
Fixed In Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance, fixed the issue where the Y-axis of a widget is not changed to match the changed metric.
Fixed In Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance, fixed the problem where the loading indicator persists displaying if there is no data to be viewed, and added a guide message for empty data.
Fixed In Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance, added the text, There are no recent views. when there is chart data but no table data.
Fixed In the Active sessions table of the Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance menu, modified to display ellipsis (...) when the instance name is longer than the width of the column.
Fixed In Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance, fixed the issue where full text cannot be viewed when the Session detail window is opened to view the past data.

Fixed In Dashboard > Monitoring Multiple Instances, changed the order of instances displayed in the custom widget in the equalizer chart format to match that of the instance list at the top of the screen.
Fixed In Analysis > Counts Trend Comparison, added the information for [Reference]/[Comparison] and instances in the widget tooltip.
Feature In the SQL details window of the Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance menu, added the active session information.
Feature In the Filter option of the Analysis > SQL Analysis menu, added the condition, object_name.
Changed In Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance, changed the style for the TOP STAT and TOP EVENT windows and the table content.
Fixed In the Account creation step of the Management > Agent Installation menu, corrected wording in the command granting the role to query the hidden parameters.
Fixed In the SQL details window of the Stat/Report > MYSQL SQL Statistics menu, fixed the issue where the hash value is displayed as undefined.
Feature Added the Resource Load Statistics menu to visually provide performance data for each resource and to analyze the load time, resource size, performance trends by type, and the like.
Changed In Management > Agent Installation, added the region, Jakarta into the AWS Region selection list.
Changed In Log > Log Search, changed to enable the search button while loading the data.
Fixed Modified to display the Close button in the log activation guidance modal.
